content:
Hi, I am the author of an RFC to allow running binaries from build or development dependencies: https://github.com/rust-lang/rfcs/pull/3168

I wanted to start a discussion on this feature and elicit feedback. This is my first time contributing to the project, so I appreciate any pointers. Thanks!
@Eh2406 do you have any recommendation to move this forward? Thanks!

I don't have anything useful to add. The Cargo Team is small and our Todo list is long, we don't always give things the attention they deserve. Sorry.
Given that you are eager to move this along, I will add it to the agenda for our sync meanings.

Thanks @Eh2406 , and don't worry. I will be on vacation for a couple of weeks anyway, there's no tremendous hurry to have this solved. I just wanted to know if I am doing this right. Thank you for taking the time to write to me!
